home.title: Hēra
home.subtitle: ✨ Create magical coloring books for your kids! ✨
home.description: Choose a theme, a style, and create a unique personalized coloring book with artificial intelligence. Download instantly as PDF or receive a physical book! 📚🎨
home.chooseThemeDesc: Select from Animals, Nature, Fantasy, Science, Transport, and more!
home.customizeStyleDesc: Black & White or Colored? Pick pages count and color palettes!
home.aiGenerationDesc: Our AI creates unique, beautiful coloring pages just for you!
home.instantDownloadDesc: Get your PDF immediately or wait for physical delivery!
home.securePayment: 💳 Secure payment with Stripe • 🔒 100% Safe & Encrypted
home.joinThousands: Join thousands of happy parents creating personalized coloring books!

customize.title: Create Your Dream Coloring Book! ✨
customize.modalMessage: You will lose all your book creation progress. Are you sure you want to leave?
customize.selectThemes: Select 1 or 2 themes for your coloring book
customize.colorPaletteDesc: Choose colors from any palette below - they'll be used to color your book!
customize.previewSubtitle: Generate a preview and choose your book format!
customize.aiGenerating: Our AI is generating a unique coloring page just for you!
customize.previewDesc: This is a preview of your coloring book style!
customize.blackWhiteDesc: Your book will contain {{pages}} unique coloring pages in black and white, ready for your child to color with their favorite crayons or markers!
customize.coloredDesc: Your book will contain {{totalPages}} total pages: {{bwPages}} black & white pages to color and {{coloredPages}} colored example pages - the SAME pages but colored as inspiration!
customize.markersDesc: Soon you'll be able to order a set of markers in your selected colors along with your coloring book! Perfect for bringing your creations to life with the exact shades you chose. 🎨

contact.title: We'd Love Your Feedback! 💬
contact.subtitle: Your opinion helps us make Hera better for everyone. Share your experience with us!
contact.overallRating: How would you rate your overall experience?
contact.easeOfUse: How easy was it to use Hera?
contact.easy: Easy - Just a few minor hiccups
contact.veryDifficult: Very Difficult - Couldn't figure it out
contact.qualityRating: How would you rate the quality of your coloring book?
contact.recommend: Would you recommend Hera to friends and family?
contact.definitely: Definitely - Already told people about it!
contact.commentsPlaceholder: Tell us more about your experience, what you loved, or what we could improve...
contact.successMessage: ✅ Thank you! Your feedback has been sent successfully!
contact.errorMessage: ❌ Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
contact.footerNote: Your feedback is valuable to us. We read every message! 💜

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.emailNotification: You'll also receive an email with your book! 📧
success.checkEmail: Check your email for a copy! 📧

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.message: No worries! Your order was cancelled.
